Class ActionOnTickAnimator

Namespace
DrawnUi.Draw
Assembly
DrawnUi.Maui.dll

Just register this animator to run custom code on every frame creating a kind of game loop if needed.

public class ActionOnTickAnimator : AnimatorBase, ISkiaAnimator, IDisposable
